text: Ithi ngubani onipha (okokuziphilisa) okuvela esibhakabhakeni nasemhlabeni, noma ngubani ongumnikazi wokuzwa nokubona futhi ngubani oveza okuphilayo kokufileyo noveza okufileyo kokuphilayo futhi ngubani owenza icebo odabeni na? Ngakho-ke bayothi “uMvelinqangi” ngakho-ke wena bese uthi, “ngakube animesabi yini na”
